content: Hey! My name is Dhruv Bhatia. I've been working with Lean for a couple of semesters (under the amazing @Rob Lewis ). We've been working on new tactic called polyrith which can solve polynomial equalities through polynomial arithmetic on the hypotheses. (This is similar in spirit to how linarith solves linear equalities/inequalities using linear arithmetic on the hypotheses). We think we are at a stage where I can make a pull request, and so I wanted to ask for access to do so. My github username is dhruvbhatia00. Thanks!
Invitation sent! And thanks a lot for your contribution, this seems great!!
